org.spongepowered.api.service.permission.context

Interface ContextCalculator


  • public interface ContextCalculator
    Calculate the availability of contexts. These methods may be invoked frequently, and therefore should be fast.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accumulateContexts(Subject subject, Set<Context> accumulator)
      Add any contexts this calculator determines to be applicable to the provided accumulator.
      boolean matches(Context context, Subject subject)
      Checks if a single context is currently applicable to a single subject.

    • Method Detail

      • accumulateContexts

        void accumulateContexts(Subject subject,
                        Set<Context> accumulator)
        Add any contexts this calculator determines to be applicable to the provided accumulator.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject being checked
        accumulator - The accumulator to add to

      • matches

        boolean matches(Context context,
                Subject subject)
        Checks if a single context is currently applicable to a single subject. If this calculator does not handle the given type of context, this method should return false.
        Parameters:
        context - The context being checked
        subject - The subject this context is being checked against
        Returns:
        Whether the given context is handled by this calculator and is applicable to the given subject
